sources.title: Million Dollar Kid (1944) East Side Kids | Comedy
sources.description:
When the East Side Kids tangle with some West Side Crooks, it's a jillion dollar holler.  The gang is befriended by a millionaire whom they save from a mugging. However, they begin to suspect that the man's son was actually one of the muggers.  
 
Director: Wallace Fox
Writer: Frank H. Young 
Stars: Leo Gorcey, Huntz Hall, Gabriel Dell
Genres: Comedy

@CCC socials:
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: The gang is befriended by a millionaire whom they save from a mugging. However, they begin to suspect that the man's son was actually one of the muggers. Knowing that the boy's father is still grieving for an older son he lost during the war, and would be devastated if he learned his only remaining son was a criminal, the gang sets out to reform the boy.
metadata.Actors: Leo Gorcey, Huntz Hall, Gabriel Dell
